name: Dalcom
tagline: We are changing the future of retail
description:
Dalcom has evolved from a niche Navision Solution Center into a growing, vibrant provider of solutions for the Retail industry. With our leading edge, award winning products from IBM, NCR, HP, Microsoft and SAP, Dalcom offers the latest in technology solutions for the Point of Sale, Enterprise Resource Planning(ERP) and business environment.Sales of 3COM phone systems, PC’s, servers and structured wiring are complimentary products and services offered by Dalcom.
Today, Dalcom is a force in the point of sale industry in our markets, partnering with industry leaders such as NCR and IBM.We at Dalcom pride ourselves in being a “total solution” provider for our customers. We offer sales, installation and ongoing service. On site service is provided in the states of NC, SC, TN, Virginia and West Virginia with other states being served by Dalcom’s servicing partners from IBM and NCR.
Our Customers, Partnerships and Alliances are the keys to our success!
